amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 117-59 as en bloc No. 1: Nos. 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, and 9.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 1 comprised of amendments numbered 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, and 9, printed in House Report 117-59.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendments (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 215 - 211 (Roll no. 165).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A003) offered by Ms. Waters.
